posts.title: anaconda install
posts.text: 12345678910111213141516171819# 设置anaconda 国内仓库镜像conda config --add channels https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/pkgs/free/conda config --add channels https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/pkgs/main/conda config --set show_channel_urls yes# 创建python2.7 环境conda create -n py27 python=2.7# 进入python2.7环境activate py27# 在当前环境中,安装ipykernelpip install ipykernel# 退出当前环境deactivate# 在py27环境调用kernel执行命令python -m ipykernel install --name py27

posts.title: config docker images mirror in china
posts.text: if docker was installed on ContOs, to config the mirror url,we should create a file within /etc/docker1vi /etc/docker/daemon.json put follow contents info the file123{ "registry-mirrors": ["https://registry.docker-cn.com"]}

posts.title: show/hide column
posts.text: 123456789// get hidden columnsvar hidden_columns = grid.columns.filter(c => c.hidden)// show columnshidden_columns.forEach(c => grid.showColumn(c))// hide columnsgrid.hideColumn('columnId')
